New Records: The Orlando Magic snapped a five-game losing streak with their victory over the New Orleans Pelicans.
Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans had a 17-1 run after the Magic took a 24-point lead.
Jalen Suggs made a key three-pointer to end a field goal drought.
Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans were missing several key players, including Zion Williamson, due to injury.
The Orlando Magic were playing strong at home, with a 10-game winning streak including the playoffs.
Post-Match Reflections: The Orlando Magic's victory was a crucial step in their journey.
The New Orleans Pelicans struggled without their key players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was followed by the teams' upcoming schedules.
The Orlando Magic's home winning streak was noted.
